text: Crash Bandicoot is a video game character from the video game series with the same name, where he is the hero. He is a bandicoot who acts like a human, wearing blue jeans and trainers. == Other websites == * Crash on Naughty Dog.com * Official site of the Vivendi Universal * European site of the Vivendi Universal Category:Video game protagonists Category:Fictional mammals Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1996 Category:Crash Bandicoot characters
title: Crash Bandicoot (character)
